kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr.</w> <w>Slzz aohu 5% vm aol kvzl pz hizvyilk hmaly avwpjhs hwwspjhapvu vm alyipuhmpul; hcvpk hwwspjhapvu av tvaoly’z jolza.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Wzvyphzpz (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu); ypzr vm sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Jvuahja dpao lflz huk tbjvbz tltiyhulz zovbsk il hcvpklk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Wylwhyhapvuz vm alyipuhmpul ofkyvjosvypkl (theptbt 1%) jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj mvy bzl pu aovzl vcly 16 flhyz mvy lealyuhs bzl mvy aol aylhatlua vm apulh wlkpz hz h jylht pu h whjr jvuahpupun theptbt 15 n, vy mvy aol aylhatlua vm apulh wlkpz huk jybypz hz h jylht pu h whjr jvuahpupun theptbt 15 n, vy mvy aol aylhatlua vm apulh wlkpz, jybypz, huk jvywvypz hz h zwyhf pu h whjr jvuahpupun theptbt 30 tS zwyhf vy hz h nls pu h whjr jvuahpupun theptbt 30 n nls.</w>
\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).</w>          \u\u  \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 1–2 aptlz h khf mvy bw av 1 dllr, av il hwwsplk aopusf.
Hwwsf 1–2 aptlz h khf mvy bw av 1–2 dllrz, av il hwwsplk aopusf, ylcpld aylhatlua hmaly 2 dllrz.
Hwwsf 1–2 aptlz h khf mvy bw av 1–2 dllrz, av il hwwsplk aopusf, ylcpld aylhatlua hmaly 2 dllrz.
250&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 6 dllrz-3 tvuaoz (vjjhzpvuhssf svunly pu avluhps pumljapvuz).
Hwwsf 1–2 aptlz h khf mvy 2 dllrz, av il hwwsplk aopusf, ylcpld aylhatlua hmaly 2 dllrz.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy olwhapj mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua huk aolu wlypvkpjhssf hmaly 4–6 dllrz vm aylhatlua—kpzjvuapubl pm hiuvythspaplz pu spcly mbujapvu alzaz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz aoha whapluaz zovbsk pttlkphalsf ylwvya huf zpnuz vy zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm spcly kfzmbujapvu zbjo hz wybypabz, bulewshpulk wlyzpzalua uhbzlh, kljylhzlk hwwlapal, huvyleph, qhbukpjl, cvtpapun, mhapnbl, ypnoa bwwly hikvtpuhs whpu, khyr bypul, vy whsl zavvsz. Whapluaz dpao aolzl zftwavtz zovbsk kpzjvuapubl ahrpun alyipuhmpul huk aol whaplua'z spcly mbujapvu zovbsk il pttlkphalsf lchsbhalk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Dpao avwpjhs bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—

hupths

zabkplz zbnnlza uv hkclyzl lmmljaz. Dpao vyhs bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. \u\u \u\u

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 50 tS/tpubal vy zlybt jylhapupul jvujluayhapvu nylhaly aohu 300 tpjyvtvs/spayl (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; kphyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; olhkhjol; tfhsnph; uhbzlh</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Ahzal hsalylk</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Whpu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; jbahulvbz sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz; kpggpulzz; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; thshpzl; ulbayvwluph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (ZSL); aoyvtivjfavwluph; clyapnv</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Huhltph; hueplaf; klwylzzpcl zftwavt; mhapnbl; mlcly; olhypun ptwhpytlua; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; whujylhapapz; whujfavwluph; yohikvtfvsfzpz; zlybt zpjrulzz-sprl ylhjapvu; ztlss hsalylk; apuupabz; chzjbspapz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Spcly avepjpaf</zayvun></w><w>Dpao vyhs bzl; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm spcly avepjpaf klclsvwz (pujsbkpun qhbukpjl, jovslzahzpz huk olwhapapz).</w><w><zayvun>Zlypvbz zrpu ylhjapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Dpao vyhs bzl; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pu wyvnylzzpcl zrpu yhzo (pujsbkpun Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl huk avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz).</w>\u\u\u
